alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 22 at 2:05PM MST until January 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Kiowa, Bent, Prowers, and Baca Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing fog and a light glaze of ice are possible, which could create slippery conditions, especially on bridges, elevated surfaces, and lesser used side roads.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County
